name: Galactic Blasters D2 - Brilliant Supernova [The Trial]
name_original: Galactic Blasters D2 - Brilliant Supernova [The Trial]
description:
Galactic Blasters D2 - Brilliant Supernova is the 5th Galactic Blasters game.

It's a horizontal space shooter game, and the direct sequel to Galactic Blasters D - Future Darkness. In the year 2046, soon after Codename: STEP was stopped by the H.D.E., large enemy fleets are detected going to Mars. Naturally, the H.D.E. Leader sends three members of the H.D.E. to investigate the appearance of the fleets. However, as the members go deeper into Mars, they start to see a larger plan unfolding. One that involves a Hyper Supernova...

[Rating - RGAR ?] [Game - The Trial a3.00]
